name: KENNY DIES
description:
A bad south park fan game.

What happens when Kenny Dies?

Where does he go before respawning?

This game is not the answer.

In this game you go through the afterlife whose police force are a bunch of blobs.  Can you return to reality. (Yes, the game is kinda easy)

This is my first playable game.

IMPORTANT: To Anyone who owns/works on 'South Park'. If you want me to take down this game, leave a comment below and I will remove the game from itch.io.

ALSO IMPORTANT: The Exit Button is broken.

Music: "Rhinoceros" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/b...

This Game also uses ambience by AlexKitten On Scratch.

Link to their account: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/AlexKitten/

This game wouldn't have been possible without the help of the 2D Tech Camp Game Design Course. Thanks to them!
